title: What’s my Alzheimer’s risk, and can I really do anything to change it?
summary: Can you escape your genetic inheritance, and do lifestyle changes actually make a difference? Daniel Cossins set out to understand what the evidence on Alzheimer’s really means for him

title: World’s oldest person had a young microbiome and 'exceptional genome'
summary: Scientists have studied the genetics and lifestyle factors that enabled María Branyas Morera, officially the oldest person in the world until she died last year, to reach 117 years old
